Description: Shop By Department New Arrivals On Sale Pre-Owned Gear & B-Stock Epiphone G310 SG Guitar in Ebony Mint Condition w/ Six Month Alto Music Warranty! The Epiphone G-310 SG Electric Guitar is an axe that delivers everything from warm distortion to all-out scream. Crafted with alder body, bolt-on mahogany neck, and rosewood fingerboard with dot inlay. Also has chrome LockTone Tune-O-Matic bridge and stopbar tailpiece for more sustain and easier string changing, and LockTone tuners. Limited lifetime warranty.
